subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Based on an examination of the last 10 years of data from running backs at the combine, it is clear the 40-yard dash does help predict whether a college running back will be an effective professional.
snippet: Based on an examination of the last 10 years of data from running backs at the combine, it is clear the 40-yard dash does help predict whether a college running back will be an effective professional.
